attachments.title: The two best pieces of early-stage pitchingÂ advice
attachments.text: Over the past 10 years I've been on the first cap tables of three startups for which I've been responsible for closing their capital-raising efforts. I&rsquo;ve raised money from the smallest angel investor to the biggest European VC funds and some of the world&rsquo;s largest corporate investors. My present role has me on the other side of the table, assessing the pitches of early-stage startups.
attachments.fallback: TechCrunch Link: The two best pieces of early-stage pitching advice
